column2: "Na ma wo nua Aaron
column3: nye ne mbabanyin no nka no ho
column4: mfi Israelmba no mu mbra wo nkyɛn

column2: "Na pam ntar krɔnkrɔn ma wo nua Aaron
column3: wɔ enyimnyam nye ahoɔfɛw ntsi."

column2: "Na kasa kyerɛ hɔn a wɔyɛ abadwembafo a medze nyansa sunsum mahyɛ hɔn ma nyinara
column3: ma wɔmpam Aaron ntar no mfa ntsew no ho

column2: "Na ntar a wɔmpam nye yi; akatabo
column3: nye egugudo
column5: nye sortar a wɔawen no dam dam
column7: nye abɔdo: na wɔmpam ntar krɔnkrɔn mma wo nua Aaron

column2: "Na wɔmfa sika no
column3: nye bibir no

column2: "Na wɔnyɛ egugudo no sika
column3: bibir

column2: "Onnya abatsir ahoma ebien a otuatua n'ano ebien no; ma wɔdze aabɔ mu atoa."
"Na nkyermu abɔdo a wɔawen a ɔwɔ no do
column3: ma wɔdze aabɔ ne nyinara do no
column4: nyɛ dɛ n'edwinsa a ofi ahoma kor no ara mu; sika

column2: "Na fa abo a no su tse dɛ epopobibir ebien
column3: na kyerɛw Israelmba hɔn edzin wɔ do:"

column2: "hɔn edzin esia ndzi ɔbo kor do
column3: na esia a wɔaka no hɔn edzin ndzi ɔbo kor no so do
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn awoe mu tse."

column2: "Ɔbosiamfo edwinsa
column3: ɔtse dɛ nsɔwanokaba nkyerɛwee
column4: na fa kyerɛw abo ebien no do
column5: dɛ mbrɛ Israelmba hɔn edzin tsetsee: yɛ no ma sika mbraho ntwa ho nhyia."

column2: "Na fa abo ebien no bobɔ egugudo no n'abatsir ahoma no do
column3: ma ɔnyɛ nkaa abo mma Israelmba no: na Aaron nsoa hɔn edzin wɔ n'abatsir ebien no do wɔ EWURADZE enyim mfa nyɛ nkaa."

column2: "Na yɛ sika mbraho:"
"nye sika mapa ntweaban ebien; yɛ no dɛ ahoma
column3: mbɛsawɔw edwuma: na fa ntweaban a wɔawɔw no mbɛsa no hyehyɛ mbraho no do."

column2: "Na yɛ atsɛmbu akatabo
column3: odwimfo pa edwinsa; dɛ mbrɛ egugudo edwuma no tse na yɛ no; sika
column7: nye ndwera fɛɛfɛw a woefira na fa yɛ."

column2: "Ɔnyɛ etwaanan mbɔho; ne tsentsen nyɛ nsatseama
column3: na ne tɛtɛr nyɛ nsatseama."

column2: "Na fa nsisimu abo sisi mu
column3: abo akyerɛpɛn anan: kyerɛpɛn a odzi kan no nyɛ bɔgyanambo

column2: "na kyerɛpɛn a otsia ebien no nyɛ nserɛmɛmbo
column3: hoabo

column2: "na kyerɛpɛn a otsia ebiasa no nyɛ ekutuhonbo
column3: mfrafrabo nye ɔberdumbo;"

column2: "na kyerɛpɛn a otsia anan no nyɛ sikabereebo
column3: epopobibirbo nye ahwehwɛbo:  na ne nsisimu no
column5: "#28.17-20 NSISIMU ABO … AHWEHWƐBO: Iyinom nyinara yɛ aboɔdzen abo a wɔdze dzi edwin
column6: mbrɛ hɔn su tsetsee no na ɔahwɛ ama hɔn edzin."

column2: "Na abo no nyɛ dɛ mbrɛ Israelmba hɔn edzin tsetsee
column3: duebien
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn edzin tsetsee; dɛ nsɔwanokaba nkyerɛwee
column5: dɛ mbrɛ baako biara ne dzin tse

column2: "Na fa sika mapa yɛ akatabo no do ntweaban dɛ ahoma
column3: mbɛsawɔw edwuma."

column2: "Na yɛ akatabo no do sika nkaba ebien
column3: na fa nkaba ebien no hyehyɛ akatabo no n'ano ebien no do."

column2: "Na fa sika ntweaban a wɔawɔw no mbɛsa ebien no hyehyɛ akatabo no n'ano nkaba ebien no mu."
"Na ntweaban a wɔawɔw no mbɛsa ebien no n'ano ebien a aka no fa toatoa mbraho ebien no mu
column3: na fa hyehyɛ egugudo no n'abatsir ahoma no do wɔ n'enyim afamu."

column2: "Na yɛ sika nkaba ebien
column3: na fa hyehyɛ akatabo no n'ano ebien no do
column4: wɔ ne nkyɛnmu afamu a ɔba egugudo no ho no."

column2: "Na yɛ sika nkaba ebien
column3: na fa hyehyɛ egugudo no n'abatsir ahoma ebien no do wɔ ase
column6: wɔ egugudo no ne nkyermu abɔdo a wɔawen no do."

column2: "Na wɔmfa bibir ahoma nkyekyer akatabo no ne nkaba no nsusuo egugudo no ne nkaba no mu
column3: ma ɔmfam egugudo no ne nkyermu abɔdo a wɔawen no do
column4: amma akatabo no aannsan emmfi egugudo no ho."

column2: "Na sɛ Aaron rokɔ bea krɔnkrɔn no do a
column3: ɔnsoa Israelmba no hɔn edzin wɔ atsɛmbu akatabo no mu wɔ n'akoma do
column4: mfa nyɛ nkaa wɔ EWURADZE enyim daa."

column2: "Na fa Urim nye Tummim  no hyɛ atsɛmbu akatabo no mu: na sɛ Aaron rokɔ EWURADZE enyim a
column3: aada n'akoma do: na Aaron nsoa Israelmba hɔn atsɛmbu wɔ n'akoma do wɔ EWURADZE enyim daa."
column4: "#Nka 27.21; Deut 33.8; Ezra 2.63; Neh 7.65 #28.30 URIM NYE TUMMIM: Ndzɛmba ebien bi a nna ɔsɔfo fa do dze hwehwɛ Nyankopɔn ne pɛ; naaso yenntum nnhu kwan a nna wɔfa do dze yɛ adwuma. N'asekyerɛ nye: Kan na emudzi."

column2: "Na fa bibir ara nko yɛ egugudo no ne bataker no."
"Na onnya tokur wɔ ne finimfin mfa mma tsir: na wɔmfa ɔtamban a wɔawen mban tokur no n'ano nhyia
column3: ɔtse dɛ dadze atar no tokur

column2: "Na no mbuano do no fa bibir
column3: nye ɔberdum
column4: nye serdaa yɛ pɔmegranate fa twa no mbuano no ho hyia; na sika ndɔndɔmba nsensɛn ne ntamu ne ntamu hyia:"

column2: "sika adɔmba nye pɔmegranate sika adɔmba nye pɔmegranate ntwa bataker no no mbuano no ho nhyia."
"Na Aaron mfa nhyɛ nsom: ama wɔaatse ne ndze wɔ aber a ɔrehɛn bea krɔnkrɔn no mu wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column3: na aber a orifir edzi

column2: "Na fa sika mapa yɛ tɛrba
column3: na kyerɛw do

column2: "Na fa fam bibir ahoma do
column3: na ɔnko asɔfokyɛw no ho; asɔfokyɛw no n'enyim na ɔmfam."

column2: "Na ɔmfam Aaron no momapɔw do
column3: na Aaron nsoa mbusu biara a aba krɔnkrɔndze a Israelmba tsew ho yɛ no krɔnkrɔn wɔ hɔn ayɛyɛdze nyinara mu no; na ɔnda no momapɔw do daa

column2: "Na fa ndwera fɛɛfɛw wen sortar no dam dam
column3: na fa ndwera fɛɛfɛw yɛ asɔfokyɛw no

column2: "Na yɛ sortar ma Aaron ne mbabanyin
column3: na yɛ abɔdo ma hɔn
column4: na yɛ mbɔtsir bi ma hɔn

column2: "Na fa hyehyɛ wo nua Aaron ne mbabanyin no ka no ho; na sera hɔn ngo
column3: na tu hɔn si nkyɛn

column2: "Na yɛ ndwera ntwontwo ma hɔn
column3: ma ɔnkata hɔn adagyaw do

column2: "na Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no
column3: sɛ wɔrokɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu
column4: anaa sɛ wɔreba afɔrmbukyia no nkyɛn abɔsom wɔ bea krɔnkrɔn no mu a
column7: na woeennwu: ɔnyɛ daa ahyɛdze mma ɔno nye n'asefo a wobedzi n'ekyir no."
